command.namerscoreboards.nick.set.fail.l: Nickname "§6%s" is longer than max nickname length (§a%s)

Allow setting own nicknames is currently %s
text.config.namerscoreboards.title: NamerScoreboards Configuration
text.config.namerscoreboards.option.maxN: The maximum length of a nickname. Set to 0 for no limit.
text.config.namerscoreboards.option.allo: If enabled, players can use placeholder api formatting in their nicknames
If enabled, all players can set their own nicknames. If disabled, only operators can set nicknames.
